Junior in Computer Science
 dylangwight@gmail.com

\ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.
\ 
\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.
Acknowledgements Return to menu

In the first phase, select the longest scrambled word you can find in each grid. You will get to keep the letters you use in the second phase. You can clear your current word by clicking on a selected tile. 

 In the second phase, make words by selecting letters in different grids. You will score points for each word you add. Rarer letters are worth more points!
I used www.stackoverflow.com and http://developer.android.com for genral java and android help. I tried to use www.androiddesignpatterns.com/2012/05/using-newinstance-to-instantiate.html to pass arguments into Fragments/Activities. The Background image and the sounds are taken from the Ultimate Tictactoe game.
I used www.stackoverflow.com for general java and android help.
